content: WHAT CRASH? Â WHAT CORRECTION??!? WHAT BEAR MARKET??   Now for something completely new! Â A custom ballet Cypher Hodl card with part of my companys copyrighted logo!Â Â  Please read here>>>> Â https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5465613.msg62793953#msg62793953Â I have only made 50 of each and will raffle one each week until I run out! Winner can pick one of the two as he or she choosesFace value says its 0.0005BTCâ€¦..which was an error at my end as I wanted to really have 0.00005 BTC.Â I will load all these cards with 0.00005 BTCâ€¦I will leave the rest for you to load to match the face valueÂ Â The sunrise card were loaded with $1 in BTC at the time of loading.Â Â Winner is allowed to pick only one of their choice!Â Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  KEEP ON HODLING FELLAS!!! Â  Â Â Free shipping in the USA, if overseas I can ship to MinerJones and you pay him for handling and reshippingOnly one spot per person.No NEWBIES registered anytime after 1st of JULYONLY ONE RULE>> PICK A Â NUMBER NO RANDOMS PLEASE..sorry randoms will be ignoredÂ Â Â  I also suggest using Â privnote.com to send me your addy via PM once raffle winner wants to get in touch with me.Its for your privacy. Â  Â You have to reach out to me when winning. If items are stolen or does not arrive because of thievery in the postal system I am not sending a new one.Read all of this and then decide if you want in or not. I am not responsible for any failed deliveries.Â I am sending out of the goodness of my heart and that's it. Â  This applied to all auctions in the past and future ones as well as the thread says. Goodluck!DO NOT SEND ME A PM WITH PRIV NOTE... UNLESS YOU WIN THE RAFFLE.If you win yes...if not no! And please send within 24hrs so I can keep track on who won what. Thanks Â  PLEASE PLACE YOUR INFO AS FOLLOWS WHEN PLACING YOUR LETTER OR NUMBERC KROGOTHMANHATTANIt makes my life easier to copy and pasteAnd it keeps me in a good mood too! Just a reminder for everyone past, present and future....Â Â  a) I do this for fun. I am not compensated by anyone and there is no angle in this for me.Â Â  b) I do not hodl onto any addresses they are destroyed each time I place an order.... any repeat winner has to resubmit their addresses.Â Â  c) Pass on the good deeds to others and enjoy Â  and keep on HOLDING!!!!Â Â  d) I reserve the right to refuse anyone from participating in my auctions!Â Â Â Â ********************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************************Information threads made byKrogothManhattanà¸¿BitBillsPhysical Bitcoin CreedCrypto Stamp WebsiteBitcoin Postage StampsCypher Hodl-TIMELINEKrogothmanhattan crypto shopBeware of Fake Casascius coins All about Coldkey cardsStorage for your collectablesMTGox yubi and MTGox OTP cardKrogothmanhattan escrow serviceBreached and Scam coin makers listHelp me name my new custom Bitcoin painting Private issue custom made Coldkey krogoth cards Past Collectable Auction or selling prices with links Introducing CYPHER STAMPS by CYPHER POSTAGEMaster Store list of Collectables section sales threadsStamps go digital-Collectable Blockchain postage stamp Free Daily Raffle Rules and posting of received free coins Unique, Rare and All Crypto Collectable Posting Thread with LINKS How to Generate a signed BTC transaction using Electrum and TrezorOffline signing your paper wallet using air gapped phone via ElectrumCRYPTO DANE VIDEO INTERVIEW FOR CYPHERHODL PHYSICAL BITCOIN PRODUCTSWanted to share my latest comissioned artwork -
